custom-action.name: TextType _mail
custom-action.description:
This Action sends a text with an optional list of modifiers.
Possible parameters are: - text (required): Alphanumeric text to send on the keyboard. - typingRateInMs (optional): Delay in milliseconds between each key typed. "0" means no delay. Default value is "150". - modifiers (optional): Comma separated modifiers from the following: [ALT, CTRL, SHIFT, EXTENDED].
